Added_Other.purpose: Improves performance and speed of 3D object movements, making gameplay smoother.

Added_Other.name: FFlagDisableFullscreenToastWhenNotPointer
Added_Other.mechanism: Prevents toast notifications from appearing in fullscreen mode when not using a pointer device.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces distractions for players in fullscreen mode, allowing for a more immersive experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAudioTremolo
Added_Other.mechanism: Activates a new audio effect that modulates sound waves.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances the audio experience by adding depth and richness to sounds.

Added_Input.purpose: Provides better compatibility and support for players using gamepads.

Added_Input.name: FFlagGamepadPreferredWhenKeyboardPending
Added_Input.mechanism: Prioritizes gamepad input over keyboard input when both are available.
